property.name: Text
property.shortdesc: Get or set the text of an item.
property.longdesc: Get or set the text of an item.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$item  = new ListBoxItem("Canada");

	$item->Text = "Canada";
	$item->Value = "canada";	
	$item->ToolTip = "Choose canada";
	$item->ImageUrl = "images/canada.jpg";
	$item->CssClass = "my_css_class";

	$item->Selected = true;
	$item->Checked = true;
	$item->Checkable = false;
		
	$listbox->AddItem($item);
...
?>

property.name: Data
property.shortdesc: Get or set extra data for an item.
property.longdesc: Get or set extra data for an item.

property.name: Value
property.shortdesc: Get or set the value of an item.
property.longdesc: Get or set the value of an item.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$item  = new ListBoxItem("Canada");

	$item->Text = "Canada";
	$item->Value = "canada";	
	$item->ToolTip = "Choose canada";
	$item->ImageUrl = "images/canada.jpg";
	$item->CssClass = "my_css_class";

	$item->Selected = true;
	$item->Checked = true;
	$item->Checkable = false;
		
	$listbox->AddItem($item);
...
?>

property.name: ImageUrl
property.shortdesc: Get or set the image url of an item.
property.longdesc: Get or set the image url of an item.
property.samplecode:

property.name: CssClass
property.shortdesc: Get or set the css class for an item.
property.longdesc: Get or set the css class for an item. The css class will apply to <li> tag of item.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$item  = new ListBoxItem("Canada");

	$item->Text = "Canada";
	$item->Value = "canada";	
	$item->ToolTip = "Choose canada";
	$item->ImageUrl = "images/canada.jpg";
	$item->CssClass = "my_css_class";

	$item->Selected = true;
	$item->Checked = true;
	$item->Checkable = false;
		
	$listbox->AddItem($item);
...
?>
